entities.name: NVIDIA
entities.description: NVIDIA invents computing technologies that improve lives and address global challenges. It integrates sound environmental, social and corporate governance (ESG) principles and practices into every aspect of the company.

entities.name: NOMINATING AND CORPORATE GOVERNANCE COMMITTEE
entities.description: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee of NVIDIA's Board of Directors is responsible for reviewing and discussing with management the company's practices concerning ESG.

entities.name: SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION
entities.description: The Securities and Exchange Commission, or SEC, is a regulatory body with which NVIDIA files reports.

relationships.relationship_description: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee is responsible for reviewing and discussing NVIDIA's ESG practices with management.
NVIDIA files reports with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
